comment.author: 36604767@N00
comment._content: The creosote is why this area of Albuquerque is now a Superfund site. www.epa.gov/superfund/sites/npl/nar1353.htm

comment.author: 94614288@N00
comment._content: thanx for the info. when I lived there from '78 to '89, people in rural areas were still drinking from wells.  run off from construction was also responsible for the health problems.
